name: Unbeatable Breeze
description: Feel the breeze! This is a demonstration of Zero Insanity's first game, Unbeatable Breeze, a parkour game that tests your reflex and judgement as you jump long gaps and run walls, all to make it to the end. Press Z to jump, press the up arrow key when near a purple wall to run the wall, and use the left and right arrow keys to move. This game is quite challenging, since you can not move in mid-air, which means you have to calculate your speed carefully before jumping!
